actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wool Products Labeling Act of 1939 with respect to recycled wool.

summary.text: Sets forth the definition of the term "recycled wool" as it is to be used in the Wool Products Labeling Act. States that labels under the Wool Products Labeling Act shall use the term recycled rather than reused or reprocessed.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wool Products Labeling Act of 1939 with respect to recycled wool.
